definition: (of cereal crops) to collapse and lie flat
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to lean over/to fall (go down)/to hide (in ambush)/to conceal oneself/to lie low/hottest days of summer/to submit/to concede defeat/to overcome/to subdue/volt

sentences.english: The hurricane flattered crops, uprooted trees, washed away roads and rippled off roofs.
sentences.chinese: 颶風所到之處，莊稼倒伏，樹根拔起，房頂掀飛。

sentences.english: Lodging seriously influenced the yield and quality of maize.
sentences.chinese: 倒伏嚴重影響玉米產量和品質。

sentences.english: This fertilizing method of basal plus dressing can take an effect on high yield without lodging.
sentences.chinese: 基施加追施的方法能有效增產而不倒伏。

sentences.english: The area ratio between the transection of pith and whole stern is an important factor on lodging-resistant.
sentences.chinese: 髓和莖橫切面的面積比值大小是影響倒伏的重要因素。

sentences.english: The yield per plant prsented highly significant positive correlation with lodging index.
sentences.chinese: 單株產量與倒伏指數呈極顯著正相關。

sentences.english: Check the pilled specimens for evidence of irregular tumbling .
sentences.chinese: 檢查起球的試樣，如發現有明顯不規則的倒伏現象。

sentences.english: The reasons of rice lodging were analyzed, and the control countermeasures were put forward.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了水稻倒伏發生的原因，提出了相應的防治對策。

sentences.english: The heavy rain lodged the crops.
Silicon application enhanced the resistance of rice to lodging and diseases.
sentences.chinese: 施用硅肥能提高作物抗倒伏和抗病能力。

definition: (of plants) to turn green again/to revegetate
